what: Encrypt and Decrypt of office open xml files
title: Encrypt and Decrypt of office open xml files
text: R package provides cryptographic library msoc allows encrypting decrypting office open xml files R.

title: Encrypt and Decrypt of office open xml files
text: can install development version msoc GitHub : r-universe :
code: # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("JanMarvin/msoc") # Enable repository from janmarvin options(repos = c(   janmarvin = 'https://janmarvin.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org')) # Download and install msoc in R install.packages('msoc')

title: Encrypt and Decrypt of office open xml files
text: word warning. background cryptography somewhat unable maintain bundled msoc library. Assume made work ever breaks, . Due reasons package never released CRAN either.
code: library(msoc) file <- system.file("extdata", "Untitled1.xlsx", package = "msoc")  # out is an encrypted file and you will  # be unable to open it without the password out <- encrypt(file, pass = "msoc")  # out is an decrypted file and readable # without the password out <- decrypt(out, pass = "msoc")

text: password expected plain text. security importance, use package. password lost, opening file impossible.

title: Encryption/Decryption function — msoc
code: encrypt(input, output = NULL, pass)  decrypt(input, output = NULL, pass)

title: Encryption/Decryption function — msoc
text: input input file output (optional) output file. none provided, construct temporary output file file extension input file pass password decrypt/encrypt input file. password expected plain text. security importance, use package. password lost, opening file impossible.
